zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，关注支撑位]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX）价格在12.2304美元附近波动，24小时内略微下跌0.30%。从价格走势来看，AVAX近期呈现出震荡整理的态势，未能突破前期高点12.279美元，反映出短期内市场多空力量较为均衡。

在技术指标方面，当前的MACD值为-0.1524，显示出卖压相对较强，但由于信号线数据缺失，无法全面判断趋势转向的可能性。SMA(20)位于12.44071，表明短期均线仍处于下降阶段，可能对价格构成压力。

从支撑和阻力位来看，当前支撑位在12.2234美元附近，若跌破该水平，可能会引发进一步的下行调整。阻力位则在12.279美元，突破后将有助于重塑市场信心。因此，投资者需密切关注这些关键水平。

建议短期内谨慎交易，若价格回调至支撑位附近，可考虑适量布局。但若价格持续走低，则应保持观望，待市场出现明确的反转信号再做决策。保持灵活应变，将有助于更好地把握市场机会。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.2304, showing a minor decline of 0.30% over the last 24 hours. This slight downturn suggests that the market may be experiencing a consolidation phase after recent fluctuations. The price action has oscillated between a high of $12.279 and a low of $12.2234, indicating a relatively tight trading range. This behavior is common in markets that are seeking direction, as traders await clearer signals.

From a technical standpoint, the absence of the Relative Strength Index (RSI) makes it challenging to assess the momentum. However, the MACD is currently negative at -0.1524, which may indicate bearish sentiment among traders. This negative MACD suggests that selling pressure could be building, potentially leading to further downside movement unless strong buying interest emerges. Monitoring the MACD in conjunction with price movements will be critical in determining the next course of action.

The Simple Moving Average (SMA) for the last 20 periods sits at $12.44071, indicating that the short-term trend may be bearish since the current price is below this average. Key support levels can be identified around $12.20, which has been tested recently, while resistance levels are found near $12.44. A breakout above the SMA could signal a potential recovery, while a drop below $12.20 might invite increased selling pressure. 

For traders, it would be prudent to adopt a cautious approach. A wait-and-see strategy could be beneficial, allowing for the observation of breakout patterns from the established support and resistance levels. If prices stabilize above the SMA, a potential buying opportunity may present itself. Conversely, if AVAX fails to hold above $12.20, short positions could be considered to capitalize on further declines.
